name: ZombiePhobia
description:
This is a unity 3D game which is a survival,bit horror,Challenging game it 
is basically a Shooting game .
What make this game challenging is the dark environment in which you can see only through your Flash light which dims with time and you have to search for a battery .
Features:
1 Multiple Weapons System ,FPS Experience
2 Ammo Pickups , Battery pickups ,Health Pickups
3 Checkpoints(as Star Pickups)
4 Challenging Fight with Zombies 

Tip - change your gun if your flash light for specific gun dims and then do search for a battery and then choose gun those battery is dim and take battery it will definitely charged
